# Class STTFactory

Factory class for creating STT (Speech-to-Text) instances. Provides methods to create both local and remote speech recognition models.

##### Index

### Methods

createLocal createRemote

## Methods

### `Static`createLocal

  * createLocal(config: [LocalSTTConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_stt_config.LocalSTTConfigInterface)): Promise<[STT](./primitives_stt_stt.STT)>

Creates a local STT instance.

#### Parameters

    * config: [LocalSTTConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_stt_config.LocalSTTConfigInterface)

Configuration for the local STT

#### Returns Promise<[STT](./primitives_stt_stt.STT)>

Promise resolving to a new STT instance




### `Static`createRemote

  * createRemote(config: [RemoteSTTConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_stt_config.RemoteSTTConfigInterface)): Promise<[STT](./primitives_stt_stt.STT)>

Creates a remote STT instance.

#### Parameters

    * config: [RemoteSTTConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_stt_config.RemoteSTTConfigInterface)

Configuration for the remote STT

#### Returns Promise<[STT](./primitives_stt_stt.STT)>

Promise resolving to a new STT instance
